title: Is the World Getting Better or Worse?
itunes:title: Is the World Getting Better or Worse?
description:
72% of people who follow me on Instagram think that the world is getting worse according to my recent poll. In today’s episode, I’m going to prove to you how this world is only getting better!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
